text: Diving at the 2015 World Aquatics Championships was held between 24 July and 2 August 2015 in Kazan, Russia.Info at FINA.org ==Events== The following events were contested: *1 m springboard *3 m springboard *10 m platform *3 m springboard synchronized *10 m platform synchronized *3 m mixed springboard synchronized *10 m mixed platform synchronized *Team event Individual events consisted of preliminaries, semifinals and finals. The order of divers in the preliminary round was determined by computerized random selection, during the technical meeting. The 18 divers with the highest scores in the preliminaries proceeded to the semifinals. The final consisted of the top 12 ranked divers from the semifinal. ==Schedule== 13 events were held.Schedule All time are local (UTC+3). {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time !
